item.title: CVE-2022-0365|2024-09-17T01:30:34.478Z -- ricon -- industrial%20cellular%20router
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an authenticated OS command injection, which may allow an attacker to inject and execute arbitrary shell commands as the Admin (root) user.
